definitions.definition: A device in which a mixture of denser and lighter materials (normally dispersed in a liquid ) is separated by being spun about a central axis at high speed.
An apparatus in which humans are spun to simulate acceleration in an aircraft or spacecraft .
By extension, any device which rotates in order to produce artificial gravity (in the form of centrifugal force)

main_definition: A device in which a mixture of denser and lighter materials (normally dispersed in a liquid ) is separated by being spun about a central axis at high speed.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) An apparatus in which humans are spun to simulate acceleration in an aircraft or spacecraft .
By extension, any device which rotates in order to produce artificial gravity (in the form of centrifugal force)
